body_html: @rdipietro Sorry, but didn't you mention you had tensorflow running on centos 6.7 and gcc 4.8.2? Were you able to run Syntaxnet also? I am stuck with the Centos 6.6 cluster and need to get Syntaxnet running on this. It works fine on Centos 7. :(

body: @rdipietro  Sorry, but didn't you mention you had tensorflow running on centos 6.7 and gcc 4.8.2? Were you able to run Syntaxnet also? I am stuck with the Centos 6.6 cluster and need to get Syntaxnet running on this. It works fine on Centos 7. :(
